name: Driving Homeicide
storyline: You are the AI Self-Driving vehicle, created to improve society. Tonight, your owner is going on bar crawl where, as he gets more bored and inebriated, he distracts or 'helps' you out with driving. Deliver him home safely at the end of the night while also discovering what else he has been doing.
summary: Driving Home(icide) is a focused and humorous single-player driving experience as you, the self-driving AI, must deliver your increasingly inebriated and distracting owner for their night on the town. Survive the increasingly difficult levels as your owner ramps up their 'help' and deliver them home in once piece.
